intro: Schaefferia ovatifolia, commonly known as the narrow-leaf schaefferia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in full sun to partial shade. It is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively drought-tolerant once established. Schaefferia ovatifolia is a perennial herb that produces showy blooms in the spring and summer months.
